title: Operation Red Sky
description: Multi-stage forensic investigation simulating a construction fraud case

steps.title: Phase 1: Budget Anomaly Detection
steps.description: System auto-detected 45% budget burn with only 12% reported physical progress on Project Nexus.
hints: Navigate to the Predictive AI tool using the notification action button
Review the leakage probability and risk indicators

steps.title: Phase 2: High-Risk Vendor Identification
steps.description: Vendor 'CV. BINTANG TIMUR' appears in transaction ledger with unusual payment patterns.
hints: Use the notification to navigate to Sanction Screening
Enter vendor name: CV. BINTANG TIMUR
Check if entity appears on watchlists

steps.title: Phase 3: Satellite Verification
steps.description: Vendor claims 'Foundation 100% Complete' but financial records show questionable material procurement.
hints: Launch Satellite Verification from the recommended tools
Compare reported vs. detected progress percentages

steps.title: Phase 4: Asset Recovery Initiation
steps.description: Funds traced to offshore shell company 'GLOBAL HOLDINGS LTD' in British Virgin Islands.
hints: Enter project ID to initiate trace
Identify recoverable assets in the flow diagram

steps.title: Phase 5: Asset Seizure
steps.description: Luxury property and crypto wallet identified. Prepare for legal asset freeze.
hints: Click the lock icon to freeze high-value items

steps.title: Phase 6: Dossier Generation
steps.description: Compile all findings into a court-ready legal dossier.
hints: Scroll to the Dossier Generator component

learningObjectives: Understand the forensic investigation workflow from detection to asset seizure
Learn when to use each specialized forensic tool
Experience event-driven navigation and context preservation
Master the Dossier compilation process for legal proceedings
